en-US.summary: Randomly selects a Latin proverb from wikiquote, reads it in Latin with IPA dictated pronunciation, and reads the English translation.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask latin proverbs to tell me a latin proverb
Alexa ask latin proverbs for a latin proverb
en-US.name: Latin Proverbs
en-US.description: Randomly selects a Latin proverb from wikiquote, reads it in Latin with IPA dictated pronunciation, and reads the English translation. If you wish to add to the list of quotes to be selected from, you can add to the wikiquote page for Latin proverbs.
